entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
